title: panic on input event on `<span contenteditable=true>`
body:
<!-- Thanks for filing a yew issue! We appreciate it :-) -->

#### Description

**I'm submitting a bug report**

see https://github.com/tiziano88/yew/commit/126bbbb39172889b84333b44dd9b6fe4e4706989 for minimal code that reproduces the issue. Run that with `cargo web start`, then edit the span in the browser.

#### Expected Results

input event is generated correctly

#### Actual Results

<!-- Describe how the bug manifests. -->
```
Encountered a panic!
```

#### Context (Environment)

- Rust: nightly-2019-07-18-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

- yew: 7311cf0bf008d8554ce98d4d41d5818800dd1fe9

- target: wasm32-unknown-unknown

- cargo-web: v0.6.26

- browser if relevant Chrome Version 75.0.3770.142 (Official Build) (64-bit)
